title: STUTTERHEIM - swedish melancholy - Serif Font ID
content:
Looking for an ID on the serif font used underneath the Stutterheim logo to spell the phrase 'Swedish Melancholy at its Driest'

Many thanks for any help,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830050617im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stutterheim-logo-and-image_4646.jpg)
